faqs.question: How do I use the Custom Model Creation tools?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://i.imgur.com/WZJybq1.png[/image]
[image]https://i.imgur.com/Ow8vvt1.png[/image]

### Merge Armatures
1. Use 'Fix Model' on both armatures
2. Choose movement method:
   - Move mesh only (uncheck 'Apply Transforms')
   - Move entire armature (check 'Apply Transforms')
3. Select base and merge armatures
4. Select attachment bone if needed
5. Click 'Merge Armatures'

### Attach Mesh to Armature
1. Position mesh
2. Select base armature and mesh
3. Select target bone
4. Click 'Attach Mesh'
